title: Collex
description: A campus-exclusive marketplace platform for students to buy and sell preloved items like textbooks, electronics, furniture, and essentials within their college community. Features verified listings, quick exchanges, and student-friendly pricing for a secure, convenient trading experience.

title: LabourHub
description: This platform is a game-changer for daily wage workers, connecting them to job providers seamlessly.

title: Refer Me
description: An online platform for engineering students, built using the MERN stack and utilizing Firebase and MongoDB for database storage
